title: Bloomberg Markets: Mericle on Novelty Fashion Thriving Online
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Mericle on Novelty Fashion Thriving Online
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Mickey Mericle Vice President of Marketing and Customer Insights Adobe Systems Discussing Adobe's May Digital Price Index showing revenue in apparel from new products (products available for one year or less) makes up the largest share of spending (80.5%) among categories tracked by the Adobe DPI.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
